home.title: Overview
home.content: inPowerSuite provides a comprehensive suite of tools to help businesses manage their sales, commissions, and customer engagement through a unified platform. **Click any feature panel title below for a deep dive into its dedicated product module.**

panels.title: Dashboards and Business Portal
listItems: Customizable back-office for members and admins

panels.title: Point-of-Sale (POS) and Retail
listItems: Receipts, card readers, and cash drawer support

panels.title: Sales, Genealogy, and Commissions
listItems: Visual genealogy charts and downline tracking

panels.title: Member Enrollment
listItems: Customizable fields for new member onboarding
Enrollment kits, product bundles, and starter packs

panels.title: Application Manager
listItems: Manage customer accounts, orders, and store settings
Monitor business performance and operational workflows

panels.title: Add-Ons and Integrations
listItems: Payment processing, fulfillment, and content management

panels.title: Frontend Modules
listItems: Web Store, Checkout, and Autoship functionality
Replicated Websites and lead tracking tools

panels.title: General Business Tools
listItems: List Manager and Print Mail features
